name: Kobrun!
description:
Hello there! This is my second complete, but first released game, made on GDevelop 5

Welcome to Kobrun! Your objective is to slam Poopkas by jumping on their heads and survive as long as you can!

Before you start suffering playing, I'll give some advice:

*Poopkas don't like when you get near the place where they come from.

*The platforms are cursed. Reeealy cursed. 

*By the color of the campfire you can understand that you'll die soon.

*There IS a secret level, try to find it ;)

The game is really simple, because I made it just for fun for my friends, and set a goal to make this game as fast as possible. Came out within 4 hours, not bad. Also note that because the game is made in pixel artstyle, it has a very small resolution. Feel free to resize the window

Credits:

*All sprites are made by me.

*The music is "Kevin MacLeod - Wagon Wheel"

*Sound effects are taken from mixkit.com

*Game made and programmed on a free 2D game engine GDevelop 5 (gdevelop-app.com)

*The Poopkas and player design are heavily referenced to My Singing Monsters

GG!
